page.title: 01Our Area
page.content: Our Area. {Newtown}and{St.Boswells}are two small villages about two miles apart situated between Melrose and Jedburgh.The Borders Regional Council have their Administrative Headquarters in Newtown.The main A68 road goes through Newtown and St.Boswells.The {River Tweed}runs through Newtown and St.Boswells.The river side is a good place to walk:we call it the Glen.The former railway line, now overgrown,is also a good place to walk.Newtown has a Vintage Rally and a Gala Week every year.St.Boswells has a fair every year.Newtown has a Bowling Club,a Youth Club and two hotels,while St.Boswells has a Cricket Club,Golf Club,Rugby Club,Tennis Club, two restaurants and one hotel.The three {Eildon Hills}lie nearby and are a landmark for miles around.
